author: arunhep
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags 
 
## RunII data 
 
   * **RunII Prompt processing** : [92X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v3) as [92X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v0](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v0) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v3/92X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v0): 
      * addition of DropBox record
      * update PF corrections for HLT

## Upgrade 
 
   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics peak scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v7) as [92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v7/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v6): 
      * update of tracker reco material : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3019.html
      * update of CSC APEs
      * Update of SiPixel Quality

   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v7) as [92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v7/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v6): 
      * update of tracker reco material : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3019.html
      * update of CSC APEs
      * Update of SiPixel Quality

   * **PhaseI 2017 design scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v7) as [92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v7/92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v6): 
      * update of tracker reco material : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3019.html

   * **PhaseI 2017 realistic scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v7) as [92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v7/92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v6): 
      * update of tracker reco material : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3019.html
      * update of CSC APEs
      * Update of SiPixel Quality

   * **PhaseI 2018 cosmics scenario** : [92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v7) as [92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v7/92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v6): 
      * update of tracker reco material : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3020.html
      * update of CSC APEs
      * Update of SiPixel Quality

   * **PhaseI 2018 design scenario** : [92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v6) as [92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v6/92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v5): 
      * update of tracker reco material : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3020.html

   * **PhaseI 2018 realistic scenario** : [92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v7) as [92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v7/92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v6): 
      * update of tracker reco material : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/3020.html
      * update of CSC APEs
      * Update of SiPixel Quality
title: GT updates for V1MC production : contains SiPixelQuality, tracker reco material update, fix to CSC APEs
